result.name: england-survey-of-visits-to-visitor-attractions
result.notes: Annual official statistic measuring the number of visits to English visitor attractions.  Results are published in August each year. Key survey deliverables include a powerpoint report (currently published as pdf), top 20 listings by region (pdf) and an excel listing of visits to all participating attractions who give permission for data to be used. All current survey deliverables are online at http://www.visitengland.org/insight-statistics/major-tourism-surveys/attractions/Annual_Survey/index.aspx
result.title: England Survey of Visits to Visitor Attractions

extras.value: The published excel spreadsheet provides key information about participating  attractions. Additional information is collected in the questionnaire, but most of this is commercially sensitive (e.g. changes in turnover, staffing) and so could not be published for named attractions, or even alongside details of type and location as these would be specific enough to de-anonymise the data set. VE will review scope of deliverables currently in pdf to explore options for publishing in other formats
